Html:
Hi!

 

Several users have requested a more detailed overview of how to color axes in DynamicDataDisplay, so I've created a sample of how to do it, which'll be included into the next D3 release.

I'm publishing it now, so that you don't wait for the release - sample can be downloaded here: http://cid-eaf0a921258b5980.skydrive.live.com/self.aspx/.Public/D3/DynamicDataDisplay%20AxisColoringSample.zip

 

Best regards,

Mikhail Brinchuk,

DynamicDataDisplay Developer.
